block-definition.comment: substitute all occurrences of a letter or a sequence of letters in a text with another or none.

inputs.input: RedRed Green Blue Yellow Purple Cyan White Black

scripts.comment: 模拟输出使用此块 从下拉列表中选择输入引脚 第二个值是输出：0-255 Analog Output uses this block Select the input pin from the drop down list and the 2nd value is the output : 0-255

we have an DAC and ADC working together the results fluctuating in a small range is expected but big changes is probably due to external noise signal we can reduce such fluctuations by adding capacitor to - power supply line to circuit say 10uF or 100uF and a 100nF - at the analog input pin if signal not expected to vary at high frequency say 10nF

block.comment: change this DAC output set value to test

scripts.comment: 请参阅 B4_1_DAC_theorectical_output.xlsx 了解更多信息 refer to B4_1_DAC_theorectical_output.xlsx for more info
观察 0 至 255 之间的变化 see the variation from 0 to 255
实际的 DAC 到 ADC 是非线性的 这是由于 - DAC 输出的线性和误差 - ADC 输入的线性和误差 the actual DAC to ADC is non-linear this is due to - linearity and error of DAC output - linearity and error of ADC input

理论上 ADC 0-4095 vs DAC 0-255 因此 DAC 中的每一步代表 4095/255= 16 Theoretical ADC 0-4095 vs DAC 0-255 Therefore each step in DAC represent 4095/255= 16 DAC : ADC 0 : 0 1 : 16 2 : 32 3 : 48 . . . 127 : 2039 128 : 2055 129 : 2071 . . . 253 : 243 : 255 : 4095
或者，如果我们有数字万用表，我们可以将探头连接到引脚 26 并读取万用表的输出 alternatively, if we have a digital multimeter, we can connect the probe to pin 26 and read the output from the multimeter
将引脚 26 连接到引脚 39，以便我们可以读取来自 DAC 的模拟输出 引脚 26：DAC 输出 引脚 39：ADC 输入 Connect pin 26 to pin 39 so that we can read the analog output from DAC pin 26 : DAC output pin 39 : ADC input
A DAC is a binary digital to analog converter. It converts a binary digital signal, say 0 to 255 for a 8-bit digital value, to an analog representation. Usually output is voltage or current.

custom-block.comment: 验证与 espSnap 的连接 verify connection to espSnap
